name: Joseph Click
summary: Sales Engineer and Solutions Consultant with a passion for building tools, solving hard problems, and delivering tailored technical value. Experienced in complex enterprise presales, PoC leadership, API integrations, cloud architectures, and value-based consultative selling. Strong track record of creating internal systems and automations that scale the impact of GTM teams. Equally at home in the code and in the room with executives.

experience.title: Senior Presales Solutions Consultant / Sales Engineer
experience.summary: Led end-to-end PoC projects with enterprise and mid-market clients, from scoping to executive readout. Built and delivered tailored demo environments that showcased value through real prospect data. Created internal automations and tooling that saved the SE org 10+ hours/week. Developed integrations with platforms like Salesforce, Shopify, Braze, Adobe Target, and Databricks. Collaborated with Product and Engineering to influence roadmap and resolve blockers. Promoted MEDDPICC and Salesforce hygiene for opportunity health. Represented SEs on advisory boards and contributed to technical enablement through custom code and workflows.

experience.title: Technical Customer Support Engineering Manager
experience.summary: Led a team of technical engineers supporting presales, services, and post-sales efforts. Designed onboarding and delivery processes that improved time to value and consistency. Acted as senior SME for complex security- and infrastructure-heavy sales cycles. Coordinated across Product, R&D, and CS to resolve customer-impacting issues. Delivered technical executive briefings and post-engagement analyses. Owned resolution of complex infrastructure, SSO, and app performance issues across enterprise deployments.

experience.title: Technical Solutions Engineer
experience.summary: Managed and executed 60+ application and database migrations from on-prem systems to a secure cloud platform. Led discovery and technical solutioning during sales cycles. Created automation scripts and documentation that scaled internal delivery capabilities. Built internal tools and handled complex integrations using REST APIs, Python, and SQL. Supported secure deployments involving SAML SSO, Oracle/MSSQL, and virtual environments.

experience.title: Founder / Operator / Diverse Roles
experience.summary: Ran a successful legal services business, handling everything from SEO to fulfillment. Worked across startups, legal, logistics, and tech. Built and optimized websites using SEO, Google Ads, and early analytics tools. Co-founded a 6-person startup and drove strategy and delivery. Developed a full-spectrum understanding of how businesses run, deliver value, and build trust with customers.

values: Curiosity – I constantly seek out new technologies, ideas, and ways to improve both systems and skills.
Ownership – If something needs doing, I take it on. If something’s broken, I fix it.
Clarity – Whether it’s a customer presentation or internal doc, I aim for simplicity and impact.
Trust-building – I show up prepared, follow through, and help others succeed.
Efficiency – I build tools and processes that save time and create leverage.
Bias for Action – I believe progress beats perfection, and execution trumps intention.
Technical Craft – I care about how things are built, not just what they do.
Team Empowerment – I build systems and knowledge that help my team move faster and smarter.
work_environment_preferences: Cross-functional collaboration with Product, Engineering, and Sales
Ability to build internal tools and processes
Opportunities to lead PoCs and technical evaluations
Fast-moving, modern tech stack (APIs, containers, cloud-native)
Culture that rewards initiative, autonomy, and builder mindset
